webscript.description:
script to move a single document (or a list of document) to archive space. accept one mandatory parameters as url parameter : requestType - values : json or xml - tell to the service that the body of this post request contains the corresponding request format the body of the post must contains an area with this parameters : json : {"documentDate":"20110101","documentLanguage":"ita","documentTypeId":"1","nodeRefs":"a,b,c"} xml :
documentTypeId documentLanguage 20110815 nodeRef,nodeRef,nodeRef
The date must be in format yyyyMMdd NodeRefs is a comma separated list of nodeRef in this format : workspace://SpacesStore/e55635f6-c8c9-4e0d-ae99-55e600a77a1d for detail about format of content received, please see org.sinekarta.alfresco.webscript.request.DocumentMoveToArchiveRequest supported return types : xml, json default : xml
